solution_line_template: Over the four hours, the tank loses {loss_rate_per_hour} * {total_hours} = <<{loss_rate_per_hour}*{total_hours}={total_loss}>>{total_loss} gallons of water.
Hayden adds a total of {added_hour_3} + {added_hour_4} = <<{added_hour_3}+{added_hour_4}={total_added}>>{total_added} gallons of water.
At the end of the four hours, there is {initial_water} - {total_loss} + {total_added} = <<{initial_water}-{total_loss}+{total_added}={water_left}>>{water_left} gallons of water left in the tank.
